import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import arrowLeft from "../images/icons/arrow-left.svg"; import arrowRight from "../images/icons/arrow-right.svg"; function ProjectDetail({ project, mobileSm, mobileLg, tabletSm, tabletLg, desktopSm, desktopLg }) { return (

) } export default ProjectDetail
